Different Crime.Crime Name: Refusal to comply with urinalysis request
legal_basis: Sections 55 and 56 of the Corrections and Conditional Release Act
cause_of_action: Applicant's refusal to comply with urinalysis and subsequent alcohol consumption breach
procedure_followed: Judicial review of National Parole Board decisions regarding parole revocation and denial
result_of_case: Court dismissed both applications for judicial review, upholding the Board's decisions
decision_reasoning: The law only requires informing offenders of the basis and consequences, not probable cause
